sentences.en: an alarm clock with a luminous dial

sentences.cn: 你常给家里打电话 吗 ?

sentences.en: He could not take his eyes away from the dial.
sentences.cn: 他的眼光离不开那仪表.

sentences.en: He took up telephone receiver and began to dial.
sentences.cn: 他拿起电话听筒开始拨号码.

sentences.en: He turned the dial on the radio.
sentences.cn: 他转动收音机的电台旋钮。

sentences.en: I think I dialed the wrong number.
She kept looking at the dial on the boiler. The needle had reached 250 degrees.
sentences.cn: 她一直看着锅炉上的刻度盘，指针已指向了250度。

sentences.en: She looked at the dial to check her speed.
sentences.cn: 她看了看仪表盘，以确认自己的速度。

sentences.en: She picked up the phone, and began to dial Maurice Campbell's number.
sentences.cn: 她拿起电话听筒，开始拨打莫里斯·坎贝尔的号码。

sentences.en: Simply dial the number and tell us your area.
sentences.cn: 只需拨这个号码告诉我们你在什么地方。

sentences.en: Swipe your card through the phone, then dial.
sentences.cn: 在电话机上刷卡，然后拨号。

sentences.en: The dial records very slight variations in pressure.
sentences.cn: 该刻度盘能显示很微小的压力变化。

sentences.en: The dial records very slight variations in pressure.
sentences.cn: 刻盘显示出压力有微小变化.

sentences.en: The heat dial was set at 150 degrees.
The lighted dial of her watch said 1.20.
sentences.cn: 她手表上的夜光表面显示时间为1点20分。

sentences.en: The needle on the dial went right round to fifty feet, which was as far as it could go, and there it stuck.
sentences.cn: 仪表盘上的指针一下转到了50英尺处，也就是到头了，然后就停在那里不动了。

sentences.en: To call the police, an ambulance or the fire brigade dial 999 and the operator will connect you.
sentences.cn: 呼叫警察、救护车或消防队，请拨打999，接线员会为您接通电话。

phrases.tran_cn: 英制千分表；度盘式指示器；刻度盘
表盘；标示板；指针板；拨号盘
转盘电话机；自动电话（等于dial phone）

trans.tran_cn: 钟面，表盘，调节器，拨号盘
trans.tran_en: the round part of a clock, watch, machine etc that has numbers that show you the time or a measurement
to press the buttons or turn the dial on a telephone in order to make a telephone call
to press the buttons or turn the dial on a telephone in order to make a telephone call
